meanings.sent1: The autogamic flowers on this plant can reproduce without the need for external pollination.
meanings.sent2: The autogamic nature of the plant allows it to thrive even in isolated environments.
meanings.sent3: The autogamic flowers were so independent, they didn't need any help from bees or butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The autogamic process in these plants is like a self-sustaining cycle of life.
meanings.sent5: Watching the autogamic flowers bloom on their own was a beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: Certain autogamic plants can fertilize themselves without external assistance.
meanings.sent2: The autogamic nature of the species ensures successful reproduction without outside help.
meanings.sent3: The autogamic plant was so self-sufficient, it didn't need any other plants for reproduction.
meanings.sent4: The autogamic ability of this species is like having a built-in fertilization system.
meanings.sent5: The process of autogamic fertilization in these plants is truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The autogamic process of self-pollination in these flowers leads to high seed production.

meanings.sent4: The concept of autogamic self-pollination is nature's way of ensuring survival.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of autogamic self-pollination lies in its simplicity and efficiency.

meanings.sent1: The autogamic process of self-fertilization allows these plants to reproduce independently.
